document.bingtitle: Can I bring fast food on a flight? - Yahoo! Answers
document.webtitle: Can I bring fast food on a flight? - Yahoo! Answers
document.description: So just get your fast food in the airport and you are good ... and there will be grease all over your tray ... security you can bring the drink from the fast food ...
